attributes.action: Ban politicians from using private health and education services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should politicians impose failing health services and schools on us and then send thier own family to good private hospitals etc.
Let them use the services they impose on us and blanket ban any person wishing to go into politics from sending thier own children and familes to private facilities, make them use the NHS and schools we have to, you never know, there may be an improvement!
